abstract.gco:CharacterString: Die Karte der Wasserschutzgebiete im Maßstab 1:25.000 stellt den Bestand an ausgewiesenen Wasserschutzgebieten in der aktuell gültigen Fassung dar. Unterschieden wird nach Zone I bis III. Die angehängten Attributinformationen sind: Name des Wasserschutzgebietes, Nummer, Schutzzone, Verordnungsdatum, Amtsblattstelle und Erfasser.

statement.gco:CharacterString: Typisierung der Gewässer auf der Basis einer DLM25 Karte...

description.gco:CharacterString: die Historie der dieses digitalen Datenbestandes wird in einem Dokument: wsg_Historie.txt dokumentiert

title.gco:CharacterString: Electrical Generation Transmission Facilities in Utah

abstract.gco:CharacterString: This dataset represents electrical generation and distribution facilities for portions of Davis, Salt Lake, Utah, Wasatch, and Weber Counties. These data were digitized as part of State of Utah Comprehensive Emergency Earthquake Preparedness Program, 1986-1989.

purpose.gco:CharacterString: For local analysis and display at 1:24,000 scale.

useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: For use at 1:24,000 scale. Data released to the Receiving Agency (RA) remains the property of the originating data source (see Source_Information) and cannot be reproduced for sale by the RA without the written consent of that data source. Redistribution of datasets unchanged as obtained from AGRC and without fee is allowed. Any hardcopies utilizing these data sets shall clearly indicate their source. If the RA has modified the data in any way, they are obligated to describe the types of modifications they have performed on the hardcopy map. RA specifically agrees not to misrepresent these data sets, nor to imply that changes they made were approved by AGRC.

supplementalInformation.gco:CharacterString: Procedures_Used: The data were digitized by AGRC using ARC/INFO. Sources of data were paper quad maps with the features drawn on them by Utah Power and Light. Reviews_Applied_to_Data: This dataset was reviewed by overlaying hardcopy plots of the digitized data on the source maps. Notes: This metadata document contains a composite of information for all tiles in the library.

abstract.gco:CharacterString: This data set represents water bodies in Utah and portions of Arizona, Colorado, Idaho, Nevada, New Mexico and Wyoming that appear on the 1:100,000 scale topographical map series from the U. S. Geological Survey (USGS).

purpose.gco:CharacterString: To show the water bodies in Utah and portions of Arizona, Colorado, Idaho, Nevada, New Mexico and Wyoming that appear on the 1:100,000 scale topographical map series from the U. S. Geological Survey (USGS).

useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: For use at 1:100,000. Data released to the Receiving Agency (RA) remains the property of the originating data source (see Source_Information) and cannot be reproduced for sale by the RA without the written consent of that data source. Redistribution of datasets unchanged as obtained from the AGRC and without fee is allowed. Any hardcopies utilizing these data sets shall clearly indicate their source. If the RA has modified the data in any way, they are obligated to describe the types of modifications they have performed on the hardcopy map. RA specifically agrees not to misrepresent these data sets, nor to imply that changes they made were approved by the AGRC.

supplementalInformation.gco:CharacterString: The data set was converted from the USGS Digital Line Graph files to ARC/INFO format by the AGRC.

abstract.gco:CharacterString: Vector Map: a general purpose database design to support GIS applications
